InstructionData.Title: PSYNC5 - 5-way Power Synchronizer
InstructionData.Author: rotiking(warg)
InstructionData.Instructions: # 5-way Power Mirror alias Device d0​ #alias deviceCount r1​ #alias index r0​ alias onoff r2​ #alias t0 r10​ #move deviceCount 1​ ​ start:​ l onoff Device On​ #move index 1​ #sle t0 index deviceCount​ # bdns​ s d1 On onoff​ s d1 Setting 100​ yield​ j start
